verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: has] been known for lying , and quite often at that . So when his supporters try to justify his lies they tend to look quite foolish . That was the case for former Trump campaign official Steve Cortes , who was taken down by CNN 's Erin Burnett after trying to defend the president 's lies .
